attributes.title: STAN LOONA BC YOU NEED SOME KPOP

attributes.review: If you are even able to open the app after the five and a half hours it takes to download it is such a disappointment. It’s all Donald Trump pictures, slogans, and sounds that spam your screen. The sound overlaps with the constant repetition of “make america great again”. Even when I exited the app the sounds were at full volume. This app doesn’t allow you to do anything but look at and listen to the horror of Donald Trump’s voice and pictures. I’m ✨scared✨. I went to apple support and they made me get a new phone because it turns out this app has hacked all of my information and the CIA still shows up at my house every evening and forces me to make them dinner. Please delete this app and your presidency🥰✨🧚
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED✨🧚

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see my favorite hot cheeto👻 when i discovered a rat🤨. this was very uncalled for as my very average dog martha ate it and then dog food poisoning😎. then we took her to the hospital only to find a debby ryan shrine🤪. next, we rushed to the emergency room where ”𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣” was playing👁👄👁. we settled martha down on the bed to wait for a doctor👩🏻‍🦲. none other than madison beer, the pisces sun💧herself greeted us at the bed🧚🏻. she then gave martha plastic surgery without her consent🧏🏻‍♀️. we rushed out of the hospital with martha who now appeared to be tiktok sensation charli damelio🤩. so, furthermore i do not recommend this app because my poor average dog martha is now charli damelio🧑🏻‍🦯. i did however give you one star because i got to meet charli😌🐒.
attributes.title: 🤩OOMPA LOOMPA🤪

attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed by an app before. When I just opened it, I noticed a few glitches here and there. Nothing too bad, just the screen freezing up, pop up ads not letting me exit out, etc. BUT, then it got worse. The app somehow managed to leak my entire photo gallery out. A trump account tweeted each of my photos one by one?? Then, my address got leaked! And finally, my social security number too! My family is scared for our lives because of this app, my life will never be the same. Please DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. This app in itself is a betrayal to the hardworking Americans of our great country. I still cannot believe Trump’s administration has let this happen. He has lost my vote.
attributes.title: Horrible, awful, worst app ever.

attributes.review: I thought this app was going to be the PERFECT 💕🧚🏻👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨 way to keep in touch with everything our GREAT 👍🏻 🤩 president has to say, but it turns out it’s nothing but 😫FAKE NEWS 😕This app took YEARS 🕑🕖🕝 to download📲. When it finally did it started smoking 💨 💕💘✨ and playing ✨fascist✨ anthems and reciting the communist🦧 manifesto 😡👺 It then shut my entire phone off 📲🚫making me submit this from my iPad. This app is run by CHINA🇨🇳. Do NOT 🚫download or they will have your personal information!!!!!👁👄👁 If you already have the app it’s probably too late and the Chinese 🦶🏻will probably come and kidnap you in your sleep and take you to Lake Laogai🌊. Your only hope is to delete☄️ the app off of your phone ☎️ and not vote for the cheeto 🦧 in november 🍃🌝✨
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app and it took FOREVER to download. Once it downloaded, it said that i had to run through the streets with the pet of my choice attached to a TRUMP 2020 sign, so I did. My dog is no longer with us, rest in piece Shart Pie😿After that horrible tragedy, it said i had to pay either $383 or a blood sacrifice from a healed covid patient. I stole a car and drove it illegally to snatch up some of my uncles blood🩸🤠. What can I say, i would do anything to see what the app is actually about, so after the death of my dog 😑🥺 and the sacrifice of my uncle 🦠👁👅👁 the app said it was failing, and i had to delete it before my phone exploded and took out everything up to 834 miles. TERRIBLE APP😾💩. DONT GET🤯🥳              TRUMP 2020🇱🇷 on top of an active landmind🙈❤️🤠
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP😡👎

attributes.review: I opened the app only to find a terrifying picture of a tangerine. I’ve always had a phobia of oranges and they have the audacity to put it as the login screen. I was just trying to support my king donald duck only to find out it wasn’t about donald duckling😔 i find this old crusty man (which now that i think back he might’ve been the tangerine i saw earlier) standing in front of an American flag but I guess he was just trying to be “hot” because girls always find it hot when guys stand in front of things they’ve destroyed😝 His saggy skin gave me the shivers and he looks as if we was being suffocated by his crusted, dusted, musted, rusted and busted republican red tie. I ALWAYS support guys who wear makeup but that shade is NOT it honey. Sorry not sorry but i’ll have to settle for biden😔
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
It is slow takes up to much and a waste of time and it wouldn’t let me open the app sometimes I hate it I will be getting the app anymore. I DO NOT recommend this app to anyone as soon as I got in to the app I seen this thing pop up saying there was a virus going to be planted if I continued so I got out of the app turned my phone off and on after I did that I went back in and saw a 🍊thing on my screen. Once I was done with the app my phone had died all of a sudden even though my phone was at 20% and now my phone isn’t charging the way it use to before I got the app. ✨🧚‍♀️ this app isn’t immaculate like the others🧚‍♀️✨. I 100% do not recommend this app and this story is 100% true.

( we got this boys)
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️disgusting 🧚✨

attributes.review: My dear Sister Allie opened the app and it gave her a seizure and it made her burst into spit and vibrate. She couldn’t breathe. She thought this was a porn app. But when she saw “TRUMP 2020” it sent her to the hospital. I don’t know if she’s okay. But your app is so bad. It caused all my family to almost die. And it’s incredibly slow and it makes my family suffer more. They supported you until you gave them these health issues. And by the looks of it, you caused many deaths. Don’t install. Horrible app. Please take it down before more innocent lives are taken. 🤡 you guys are clowns if you keep it up. My father owns the government and he will delete it in my state. And I know somebody who knows trump personally. And I will share the info with anonymous
attributes.title: It caused a Seizure
